mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (ORDER_CODE, ADMIN_CODE, USER_CODE, CART_CODE, ORDER_STATE, TOTAL_PRICE, PAYMENT_DATE, PAYMENT_METHOD, PAYMENT_STATE) VALUES (fnCode('order'), 'AD001', #{user_code}, #{cart_code}, 1, #{total_price}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{payment_method}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT F.PRODUCT_NAME, F.PRODUCT_PRICE, C.ORDER_QUANTITY, C.USER_CODE, C.CART_CODE, F.PRODUCT_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY C.CART_CODE) AS SEQUENCE_NUMBER FROM CART C JOIN FOOD F ON C.PRODUCT_CODE = F.PRODUCT_CODE WHERE C.USER_CODE = #{user_code} ORDER BY C.CART_CODE;
SELECT MAX(CART_CODE) FROM CART WHERE USER_CODE = #{user_code};
SELECT SUM(f.product_price * c.order_quantity) AS total_price FROM CART c JOIN FOOD f ON c.product_code = f.product_code JOIN USER u ON c.user_code = u.user_code WHERE c.cart_code = #{cart_code}
